in 18 games since #NHL All Star break, #Canucks PP is 8 for 52 (15.4%) and 29th in league by ranking ahead of NJD, PHI &  CBJ. Has also allowed 3 SHG. So net +5 over that stretch. Only multi-PPG game was in Carolina in first game out of break
